ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would definitely recommend it -- it's a good research seminar that balances outside examples with sufficient time to work on a revised draft of an article. The size was small, which I found helpful for developing my own ideas.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: In terms of my own work, the seminar helped greatly with confronting big questions in the labor and political economy field and the development of my own project. Without suggestions from professor Klein and my peers, I would think that my dissertation project would not be as far along.
